import React, { useState } from "react"; function About(props) { const [mystyle, setMystyle] = useState({ color: 'blue', background: 'white', }) const [btntext, setBtnText] = useState('Enable Light Mode') const togglemystyle = () => { if (mystyle.color === 'blue') { setMystyle({ color: 'white', background: 'blue', border: '2px solid white', borderRadious:'10px' }) setBtnText('Enable Light Mode') } else { setMystyle({ color: 'blue', background: 'white' }) setBtnText('Enable Dark Mode') } } return ( <>

About Us

) } export default About;
